body.p: I have been in impatience eversince I saw your advertisement, & should have reminded you of your promise, had I not believed you would not forget me. I beg my copy may not be sewed (or at least not bound) because I intend to interleave it.
The Fly sets out for Cambridge every day from the Queens-Head in Gray's Inn Lane, & I am afraid there is no other conveyance, that comes from any place nearer to your house.
